title: Super Urgot
body: I believe {{champion:6}}  should have a wonderful skin like this..... Come on guys lets get riot to notice this and come to their senses and make this skin..

replies.body: Please. If Urgot's going to get a skin it will have to be Urgod.

> I believe {{champion:6}}  should have a wonderful skin like this..... Come on guys lets get riot to notice this and come to their senses and make this skin..
